## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5) and (41.5, -78.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-18.5, -48.5), (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5), and (-14.5, -47.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-14.5, -48.5) and (-12.5, -49.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-9.5, -49.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting Items
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to extract from contains the items you wish to extract. Verify the entity's inventory before attempting to extract.

### Errors when Furnaces Cannot Extract Iron Plates
- Ensure that the furnaces have finished processing and that there is space in the inventory to store the extracted items. Consider checking the furnace status and inventory capacity before extraction attempts.

### Errors when Clearing Chests
- Verify that the chest you are trying to clear contains the items you wish to extract. Ensure that the chest is not empty or that the item type you are extracting is present.

### Errors when Refueling
- Before refueling, check if the entity already has sufficient fuel to avoid unnecessary actions.
